name: Totally Accurate Suez Canal Training Simulator
name_original: Totally Accurate Suez Canal Training Simulator
description:
Ever wanted to become a captain? a container ship captain?  This highly accurate simulator training system allows you to learn the ins and outs of captaining a ship through the Suez Canal. Learn how to:

  • Carefully pilot a ship
  • Not get stuck
  • Care for containers
  • Control your speed
  • See the sights!

Coming soon:

  • The Suez Canal MMO 
  • Full RPG with a 20 hour storyline
  • VR Mode
  • Space Canal Simulator
  • Death on the Suez (FPS)
  • Canal Royal (Battle Royal)

(not really)

Find our other games at https://store.steampowered.com/developer/mythicalcity/#browse
